items.sentence: Both Tom and Mary wished that they were still single.
Tom and Mary both wished that they were still single.
Tom doesn't think that they'll permit you to do that.
It was one of the prettiest things Tom had ever seen.
I told Tom that he shouldn't leave his door unlocked.
I sold my clarinet, so now all I have is a saxophone.
Tom spends all day sitting in his room doing nothing.
Mary is even more beautiful than you told me she was.
I don't think Tom and Mary are related to each other.
I think we need to give Tom the benefit of the doubt.
